Detailed Description

Base class for AVRCP service classes

Member Function Documentation

BtProfile BtAvrcpService::GetProfile (   )  const [virtual]
 

Get the profile this service is associated with.

GetProfile returns the profile for which this service provides the interface, so in the base class, it is a pure virtual function.

Returns:
A BtProfile enumeration type containing the profile this service is associated with.

Implements BtService.

void BtAvrcpService::Init (   )  [virtual]
 

BOOLEAN BtAvrcpService::OnMessage (  const Message &  message  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Every message routed to a dispatcher may be treated in OnMessage.

Returns:
TRUE is returned, if the message has been dispatched.

Implements Dispatcher.

Reimplemented in BtAvrcpOperationService.

void BtAvrcpService::RegisterMessages (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

This method is invoked as soon as the user dispatcher is added to an execution context by ExecutionContext::AddDispatcher(). The derived user dispatcher should register all messages it wants to receive.

Reimplemented from UserDispatcher.

Reimplemented in BtAvrcpOperationService.

void BtAvrcpService::UnregisterMessages (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

This method is invoked as soon as the user dispatcher is removed from an execution context by ExecutionContext::RemoveDispatcher(). The derived user dispatcher should unregister all messages it has registered inside UserDispatcher::RegisterMessages().

Reimplemented from UserDispatcher.

Reimplemented in BtAvrcpOperationService.
